title: Ticket #7308: Remove pre C++11 support from classads
description: The classad build has a bunch of fiddly logic to support elderly pre-C++ 11 compilers by bringing in tr1 or boost headers and libraries. Let's remove this.
remarks:
2019-Dec-30 09:36:45 by tim:
Internal change, no documentation needed.
check_ins: 2019-Oct-08 15:51   Check-in [58057]: Remove support for tr1 and boost based pre-c++11 containers in classads #7308 (By Greg Thain )
